summary: A popular Connecticut priest shields a seminary rebel from the wrath of a stern monsignor.
cast: Jack Lemmon|Zeljko Ivanek|Charles Durning|Louise Latham|Alice Hirson|Helene Heigh|Sharee Gregory|James Ray|Lois De Banzie|Talia Balsam|Jerry Hardin|R.J. Williams|Noni White|Gloria Stuart|Maggie Gwinn|F. William Parker|John Vargas|Fran Robinson|Richard Doyle|Terry Wills|Suzanne Kent|Christopher Carroll|John Devlin|Ann Nelson|John C. title: Algo en que creer
